collectible.text: A small animalâ€™s hide which has been meticulously tanned. As a skilled hunter, Petra is no stranger to leatherworking. She and Leonie are both experienced at hunting wild game, something which they could later bond over.
collectible.unlock: See Leonie and Petra do at least one version of their dual forfeit. First, Leonie and Petra must be in adjacent spaces, and both in their default costumes. Then, Leonie and Petra need to flirt with each other at least four times in one game. Finally, one of them needs to 'finish' before the other starts their forfeit. To increase chances further, play alongside Yuna (Kindred Spirits on the Roof).
